title: Ruby and Diamond Dangle Earring - A Contemporary Classic
features: This earring features a geometric design with Polki diamonds and a carved Ruby. The Ruby shows detailed floral carving. Each element is framed with Polki diamonds set in gold. Hyderabadi craftsmanship is evident in the intricate detailing and the use of traditional techniques.
occasions: and festive celebrations. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance and tradition to modern attire. Can be worn for formal gatherings.
description: This earring marries traditional South Indian design with a contemporary aesthetic. The use of Polki diamonds adds a vintage touch, while the carved Ruby brings a pop of color and intricate detail. Handcrafted in Hyderabad, it represents a legacy of jewelry-making expertise.
